data.eml:eml: Cytotaxonomy of the Simuliidae (Diptera): a systematic and bibliographic conspectus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Adler, Peter H., Crosskey, Roger W. (2015): Cytotaxonomy of the Simuliidae (Diptera): a systematic and bibliographic conspectus. Zootaxa 3975 (1): 1-139, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3975.1.1
